program.name: app.eo
program.listing:
+package test12 +alias stdout org.eolang.io.stdout +alias sprintf org.eolang.txt.sprintf
[] > var memory > value! [y] > set ^.value.write y > @ [] > get ^.value > @
[] > varInt "int" > type var > @
[] > toString sprintf > @ "%d" ^.get
# Попытка выполнить цикл [] > app varInt > i! seq > @ i.set 1 while. less. i.get 10 seq stdout sprintf "i = %d" i.get i.write add. 1 i.get <EOF>

class.name: var
var$set
var$get
varInt
varInt$toString
app
